page.title: 14LEISURE AND PASTIMES
page.content: There are no sports centres in our D-BLOCK but there are two public playing fields.Most people travel to Yarborough sports centre and swimming pool in Lincoln.A very popular pastime is bird-watching or walking.A lot of people go cycling which is an increasingly popular sport.Football is played on the playing field in Langworth and is quite popular.Flower arranging is enjoyed by old and young alike.There is a 'Women's Institute' group in Scothern and another meets at Langworth.The 'National Housewives Register' mainly meets in Sudbrooke.There are two Brownie packs in our area but no Guides.Cubs and Scouts have to travel to Nettleham to meet at the Scout hut.The Scout movement have a camp-site and adventure park in the wooded area at Sudbrooke.
